title: When are Liss and Gnar getting nerfed?
body:
I find them to be really annoying to lane against with riven and would like to know when riot is going to delete or nerf them please. I am hoping for Gnar to be deleted and Liss aint really broken just really annoying. I think ranged top laners are just getting out of control.
Gnar is a resourceless range poke champ with an escape/gap closer that is good in teamfights NOT JUST not bad he IS FUCKING GOOD, I understand some champions can beat him top but I find it very annoying to lane vs him then have the little cunt build full tank and out scale me whilst still doing damage. I have beaten Gnars but it relies completely on them getting too close to me.

Please Riot delete Gnar from League of Legions.
*signed sincerely, **The King of Swing***

replies.body:
They do have weaknesses - just not terribly obvious ones.

In Lissandra's case, I can vouch for her epic poke, but for a mage it's quite short ranged and pushes the wave. Lissandra hates all-in champs that can CC her out of using E and don't care about her W (Jax, Fiora, Riven if you're good) She has excellent escape, but that escape is on a 10 (W) or 20-ish (E) second cooldown. Once she uses those spells she has nothing left to defend herself, and is easily shredded by the likes of the above.

I don't play Gnar, but have played against a few as Riven. His E is on a 20-second CD aswell, so when he uses it, you have control of the lane if he's using it to escape. The best solution to a Gnar is all-inning him when he is in Mega form and is about to go little. He's slow enough to catch up with in Mega form, and when he switches to Mini use your CC to keep him there. Mini Gnar is squishy as hell so managing to catch him spells his death, much like Teemo. Also TBH his boomerang doesn't do a whole lot of damage, his W is what hurts the most for me.

TLDR: Long Cooldowns need to be exploited more - learn your enemy and keep a mental check on their abilities.
Thank you, that will help alot. I have not bought Gnar yet on either of my account so yeh I didnt know this stuff, ty.

Yeah I hate that Gnar fellow also.

Rito please,
*signed sincerely, **GNARISOPAF***

Ranged top laners have always been a problem and that's simply due to them poking the sh*t out of you while never seeming to run out of mana, a Gnar can just spam Q and auto attack, a Ryze can roll his face on the keyboard, a Lissandra can just spam her high damage Q over and over again with little mana cost and if you try to fight her she just stuns you and walks away of uses her blink etc etc...

The problem is basically them not having punishments for there high damage poke, mana champs need higher mana costs to reduce the poke or simply lower the damage, manaless champs need less damage overall, not much more to it really.

I myself don't have many issues with ranged tops (except Quinn seriously %%%% that %%%%%) but the general consensus seems to be that they are oppressive (not necessarily OP) so I came to the conclusion that Riot could tone them down a bit in the annoying areas to leave them viable but a little less pull your hair out, if you know what I mean.

If they get toned down though, they lose their pocket pick potential in their actual lanes (hell Quinn is like never an ADC)

Yes they are oppressive, but you have to learn to play against it.

Hell i had a Nasus thank me for going Quinn top at the end of the game, because he knew he had to learn to farm against Oppression and asked me for tips (12 stacks at 10 minutes is oppressive)

(Also just as a note, editing this in and all, Gnar isn't even on a 50% win rate, and yet his OP?)
I am not saying he is op im saying he encourages a boring easy, safe playstyle that fcuks over champions that take skill and knowledge of matchups to win.

I just beat gnar with shaco top. As for liss, with riven you start E level 1 to shield her Q. Her snare cooldown is quite long so abuse that. Go E, Q, Q, stun (she will snare) then last Q and auto.

Her W will be on cooldown so just go ham after. Pretty easy matchup after you get better.

As for gnar, free farm all day because ALL GNAR DOES is use that bounce thing to run away so just shield his boomerang with ur E and farm all day. If he comes close and bounce is on cooldown, go E > R > Q (if you play riven you have to jnow this combo) stun then go ham. Back off when mega gnar is up he's so tanky.
I know how to animation cancel on riven, I honestly thought their escapes had no cd for some reason, ty

I really dislike the top lane meta, even more than mid since pretty much top lane is either ranged champs like ryze (pre-nerf), liss, Quinn and gnar who can nonstop harrass you, or else it's just stuff like Dunkrius, Fiora and riven that 100-0 any melee champs. Top lane is like a rock-paper-scissors cycle that cycles around depending on who is most op.

Gnar actually isn't so bad because his boomerang can only hit you once and if he doesn't catch it then it goes on a hefty 20 second cooldown so you just have to try to pressure him after he throws the boomerang and force him to not catch it. That and being carefully about his rage and he isn't so bad.

It is hard too fight a gnar top. Very hard. But normally you can avoid his poke so long as your smart and just back off or be mobile while he is in mega form early. Late game gnar when he builds full tank yea just gg. As for Lisandra I doubt she will ever be nerfed. She has damage and cc but isn't broken. Like you said just annoying

that self circlejerk.

but I agree with gnar needing nerfs, he's cancer and should have never been released.
